description: Former President Biden said the Trump administration has “done so much damage and so much destruction” since taking office, accusing the White House of having "taken a hatchet" to the Social Security Administration (SSA) and “breaking things” as he delivered his first remarks since leaving the Oval Office earlier this year.  “Fewer than 100 days,...
title: Biden says Trump administration has 'done so much damage' since taking office
